translation.description: This GUI generates validated, fully-specified templates for data catalogue.

step_auth.name: Login via GitHub
step_auth.connect_to_continue: Connect your account via GitHub to continue
step_auth.github_authenticated: You have successfully authenticate your GitHub account
step_auth.access_is_limited: Access is limited to approved collaborators on the meta repository
step_auth.currently_logged_in: You are currently signed in. Click below to log out if needed.

error.unauthorized: Insufficient permissions (you are not an authorised collaborator).

step_basic.name: Baseline Metadata
step_basic.links_desc: Enter and validate links of the dataset to get started.
step_basic.baseline_info_desc: Enter baseline metadata about this dataset. This information is required.
step_basic.fill_all: Fill up the required info to continue

step_catalogue.name: Catalogue Setup
step_catalogue.section_explanation: Sections with the edit icon can be updated. Please fill in both English and Malay, and ensure all details are correct before saving.
step_catalogue.draft_with_ai_desc: Your text will be replaced with an AI-generated draft. You can still edit it afterwards.
step_catalogue.revert_draft_desc: This will undo all AI changes and restore your previous text

success.heading: Data Catalogue Submitted for Review
success.subheading: A pull request has been created for this data catalogue entry. You may check the PR status in GitHub

error.heading: Failed to publish
error.subheading: Your catalogue is not published to meta repository due to an error. Please try again

forms.description_en_placeholder: eg. Description of the dataset content and purpose
forms.description_ms_placeholder: eg. Penerangan tentang kandungan dan tujuan set data
forms.file_name_placeholder: Enter filename without format, eg. births or annual_births

validations.link_required: Link is required. Provide a link to continue
validations.ensure_upload: Please ensure that the file has been uploaded
validations.invalid_file_format_csv: Invalid file format. Ensure the file is in .csv
validations.invalid_file_format_parquet: Invalid file format. Ensure the file is in .parquet
validations.failed_to_retrieve: Failed to retrieve link. Please try again
